onyomiExamples.meaning: mourning, mourning period, anniversary of one's death
evasion, avoidance, shirking, recusation (of a judge), taking exception (to a judge), challenge

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to avoid, to refrain from, to shun, to detest
mourning, abstinence, taboo, religious purification, pure, holy
collecting herbs and pulling out young pine trees by the roots (annual event held on the first day of the Rat of the New Year)
fasting, abstinence, confinement to one's house on an unlucky day
unpleasant, disagreeable, abominable, disgusting, unsavory, unlucky, inauspicious, ominous
